casebody.data:
Kevin POSEY
v.
WAYNE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, INC. and Wayne Health Corporation No. 224A17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Kevin Posey, for Posey, Kevin. Patrick M. Meacham, Kayla Marshall, Raleigh, Valyce M. Davis, Attorneys at Law, for Wayne Memorial Hospital, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the notice of appeal from the North Carolina Court of Appeals, filed by Plaintiff on the 7th of July 2017 in this matter pursuant to G.S. 7A-30 (substantial constitutional question), the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals: the notice of appeal is

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
